### What do I get?

<div className="">
  <ul>
    <li>
      Landing Page with 11 sections
      <ul>
        <li>Header Section</li>
        <li>Hero Section</li>
        <li>Social Proof Section</li>
        <li>Features Section</li>
        <li>Get Started Section</li>
        <li>Testimonials Section</li>
        <li>Pricing Section</li>
        <li>FAQ Section</li>
        <li>Blog Section</li>
        <li>CTA Section</li>
        <li>Footer Section</li>
      </ul>
    </li>
    <li>Blog using MDX</li>
    <li>100% Mobile Responsive</li>
    <li>Lots of animations and micro-animations</li>
    <li>Easy to customize and maintan code</li>
  </ul>
</div>
